q_en: I am an Advanced Sewer. Please transfer all cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, to Premier Sewers.
hint: The ID of Advanced Sewers is 8, and the ID of Premier Sewers is 9. Update the database according to the time requirements described
gt:
Sure thing! ğŸ‰ The cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, have been successfully transferred from the "Advanced Sewers" group to the "Premier Sewers" group. Here's a quick summary of the update:

| Task Update | From Group | To Group | Date Range |
|-------------|------------|----------|------------|
| Cutting Tasks | Advanced Sewers (ID: 8) | Premier Sewers (ID: 9) | May 1, 2024 - May 30, 2024 |

Everything is all set! If you have any more requests or questions, feel free to ask. ğŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for "Advanced Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Premier Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for "Premier Sewers"

steps.sql: UPDATE cutting_tasks SET working_group_id = 9 WHERE working_group_id = 8 AND start_time BETWEEN '2024-05-01' AND '2024-05-30';
steps.description: Update the working group ID for all cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, from "Advanced Sewers" to "Premier Sewers"
